statements: UPDATE cybersecurity_incidents SET data_breached = TRUE, affected_systems = 10 WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE cybersecurity_incidents SET response_time = '02:30:00', incident_type = 'Phishing Attack' WHERE incident_id = 3;
UPDATE cybersecurity_incidents SET incident_type = 'Phishing Attack', data_breached = TRUE, response_time = '00:30:00' WHERE incident_id = 101
UPDATE cybersecurity_incidents SET affected_systems = 20, incident_date = '2022-07-15', attacker_id = 305 WHERE incident_id = 102
UPDATE cybersecurity_incidents SET incident_type = 'Data Leak', affected_system = 'HR Database' WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE incident_details SET description = 'Sensitive information exposed', reported_by = 'Internal Team' WHERE incident_id = 2;
UPDATE cybersecurity_incidents SET incident_date = '2022-01-15', incident_type = 'Data Breach' WHERE incident_id = 1;

UPDATE incident_details SET reported_by = 'IT Security Team', description = 'Sensitive data leak identified in server logs' WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach');
UPDATE incidents SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE users SET email = 'updatedEmail@example.com', username = 'newUsername' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE incidents SET severity_level = 3, description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE incidents SET severity = 3 WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE victims SET victim_organization = 'ABC Corp' WHERE victim_id = 201;
UPDATE incidents SET severity = 3, description = 'Data breach incident' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE victims SET victim_ip_address = '192.168.0.1', victim_organization = 'ABC Corp' WHERE victim_id = 201;
UPDATE incidents SET incident_description = 'Updated incident description' WHERE incident_id = 1
UPDATE entities SET entity_location = 'Updated location', entity_type = 'Updated type' WHERE entity_id = 2
UPDATE incidents SET incident_description = 'Data breach incident involving customer information', breach_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE incident_id = 101
UPDATE entities SET entity_location = 'New York City', entity_type = 'Corporation' WHERE entity_id = 201
